rescuecore2.components

Class AbstractAgent<T extends WorldModel<? extends Entity>,E extends Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.components.AbstractComponent<T>
      • rescuecore2.components.AbstractAgent<T,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The subclass of WorldModel that this agent understands.
    E - The subclass of Entity that this agent wants to control.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent, Component
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardAgent

    public abstract class AbstractAgent<T extends WorldModel<? extends Entity>,E extends Entity>
extends AbstractComponent<T>
implements Agent
    Abstract base class for agent implementations.

      • postConnect

        public final void postConnect(Connection c,
               EntityID agentID,
               java.util.Collection<Entity> entities,
               Config kernelConfig)
        Description copied from interface: Agent
        Notification that this agent has been connected to the kernel.
        Specified by:
        postConnect in interface Agent
        Parameters:
        c - The connection to the kernel.
        agentID - The ID of the entity controlled by this agent.
        entities - The set of Entities the kernel sent to this agent on connection.
        kernelConfig - The Config the kernel send to this agent on connection.

      • getID

        public EntityID getID()
        Description copied from interface: Agent
        Get the ID of the entity this agent controls. If the agent has not yet been connected to the kernel then null will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getID in interface Agent
        Returns:
        The entity ID or null if this agent is not yet connected.

      • connect

        public void connect(Connection connection,
           RequestIDGenerator generator,
           Config config)
             throws ConnectionException,
                    ComponentConnectionException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: Component
        Connect this component to the kernel.
        Specified by:
        connect in interface Component
        Parameters:
        connection - The Connection to use.
        generator - The RequestIDGenerator to use.
        config - The system configuration.
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If there is a problem communicating with the kernel.
        ComponentConnectionException - If the connection fails.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted before the connection attempt completes.

      • postConnect

        protected void postConnect()
        Description copied from class: AbstractComponent
        Perform any post-connection work required before acknowledgement of the connection is made. The default implementation does nothing.
        Overrides:
        postConnect in class AbstractComponent<T extends WorldModel<? extends Entity>>

      • getPreferredNDC

        protected java.lang.String getPreferredNDC()
        Description copied from class: AbstractComponent
        Get the preferred nested diagnostic context to use when processing messages for this component. Default implementation returns null.
        Overrides:
        getPreferredNDC in class AbstractComponent<T extends WorldModel<? extends Entity>>
        Returns:
        The preferred NDC for this component, or null if no context is required.

      • think

        protected abstract void think(int time,
         ChangeSet changes,
         java.util.Collection<Command> heard)
        Notification that a timestep has started.
        Parameters:
        time - The timestep.
        changes - The set of changes observed this timestep.
        heard - The set of communication messages this agent heard.

      • processSense

        protected void processSense(KASense sense)
        Process an incoming sense message. The default implementation updates the world model and calls think(int, rescuecore2.worldmodel.ChangeSet, java.util.Collection<rescuecore2.messages.Command>). Subclasses should generally not override this method but instead implement the think(int, rescuecore2.worldmodel.ChangeSet, java.util.Collection<rescuecore2.messages.Command>) method.
        Parameters:
        sense - The sense message.

      • me

        protected E me()
        Get the entity controlled by this agent.

        The entity controlled by this agent.
